name: personal-ea
description: Personal AI Assistant System - API-first microservices architecture

scripts.validate:api: npm run lint:api && echo 'All API specifications are valid'
scripts.mock:all: concurrently "npm run mock:email" "npm run mock:goals" "npm run mock:calendar"
scripts.docs:build: redoc-cli build docs/email-service-api-v1.yaml --output docs/email-service-docs.html && redoc-cli build docs/goal-strategy-service-api-v1.yaml --output docs/goal-strategy-docs.html && redoc-cli build docs/calendar-service-api-v1.yaml --output docs/calendar-service-docs.html
scripts.generate:types: openapi-typescript docs/email-service-api-v1.yaml --output types/email-service.ts && openapi-typescript docs/goal-strategy-service-api-v1.yaml --output types/goal-strategy.ts && openapi-typescript docs/calendar-service-api-v1.yaml --output types/calendar.ts

author: PersonalEA Team
